<<<<<<< HEAD
Christ the universall peace-maker: or, The reconciliation of all the people of God, notwithstanding all their differences, enmities. / By Tho: Goodvvin, B.D. Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
[2], 58 p.
Printed by J.G. for R. Dawlman, London : 1651.
The words "differences, enmities" are bracketed together on title page. Also bound with some copies of Wing G1229 and G1229A. Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 10 1650", the 51 in imprint date crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Christ the universall peace-maker: or, The reconciliation of all the people of God, notwithstanding all their differences, enmities. / By Tho: Goodvvin, B.D. Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
[2], 58 p.
Printed by J.G. for R. Dawlman, London : 1651.
The words "differences, enmities" are bracketed together on title page. Also bound with some copies of Wing G1229 and G1229A. Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 10 1650", the 51 in imprint date crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
R. Dawlman
J.G.
